title: Lombok not working in the Quarkus extension
body:
### Describe the bug

```log
[INFO] Compiling 2 source files to /mnt/d/IdeaProjects/github/quarkus-extension-example/runtime/target/classes
[INFO] -------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] COMPILATION ERROR :
[INFO] -------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] /mnt/d/IdeaProjects/github/quarkus-extension-example/runtime/src/main/java/io/github/aomsweet/ExampleRecorder.java:[15,41] cannot find symbol
  symbol:   method getAgentName()
  location: variable configuration of type io.github.aomsweet.conf.ExampleConfiguration
[INFO] 1 error
[INFO] -------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Reactor Summary for Quarkus Extension Example - Parent 1.0.0-SNAPSHOT:
[INFO]
[INFO] Quarkus Extension Example - Parent ................. SUCCESS [  0.255 s]
[INFO] Quarkus Extension Example - Runtime ................ FAILURE [  2.279 s]
[INFO] Quarkus Extension Example - Deployment ............. SKIPPED
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD FAILURE
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time:  2.736 s
[INFO] Finished at: 2021-10-21T16:20:02+08:00
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] Failed to execute goal org.apache.maven.plugins:maven-compiler-plugin:3.8.1:compile (default-compile) on project quarkus-extension-example: Compilation fail
ure
[ERROR] /mnt/d/IdeaProjects/github/quarkus-extension-example/runtime/src/main/java/io/github/aomsweet/ExampleRecorder.java:[15,41] cannot find symbol
[ERROR]   symbol:   method getAgentName()
[ERROR]   location: variable configuration of type io.github.aomsweet.conf.ExampleConfiguration
[ERROR]
[ERROR] -> [Help 1]
[ERROR]
[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch.
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.
[ERROR]
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:
[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/MojoFailureException
[ERROR]
[ERROR] After correcting the problems, you can resume the build with the command
[ERROR]   mvn <args> -rf :quarkus-extension-example
```

### Expected behavior

Compile successfully.

### Actual behavior

Compile failed.

### How to Reproduce?

1. clone [https://github.com/aomsweet/quarkus-extension-example](https://github.com/aomsweet/quarkus-extension-example)
2. run `mvn clean package install`

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

Windows 10 20H1

### Output of `java -version`

17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

21.3.0

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.3.1.Final

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

3.8.1

### Additional information

_No response_
